string-array.name: acridPassive
string-array.item: Poisonous attacks apply a powerful damage-over-time.
Attacks that apply Poison apply stacking Blight instead, dealing 60% damage per second.

string-array.name: acridPrimary
string-array.item: Maul an enemy for 200% damage. Every 3rd hit is Regenerative and deals 400% damage.

string-array.name: acridSecondary
string-array.item: Poisonous. Spit toxic bile for 240% damage.
Poisonous. Slayer. Regenerative. Bite an enemy for 310% damage.

string-array.name: acridUtility
string-array.item: Poisonous. Stunning. Leap in the air, dealing 320% damage. Leave acid that deals 25% damage.
Stunning. Leap in the air, dealing 550% damage. Reduce the cooldown by 2s for every enemy hit.

string-array.name: acridSpecial
string-array.item: Poisonous. Release a deadly disease that deals 100% damage. This disease spreads to up to 20 targets.

string-array.name: artificerPassive
string-array.item: Holding the Jump key causes the Artificer to hover in the air.

string-array.name: artificerPrimary
string-array.item: Fire a bolt for 220% damage that ignite enemies. Hold up to 4.
Fire a bolt for 220% damage that explodes in a small area. Hold up to 4.

string-array.name: artificerSecondary
string-array.item: Stunning. Charge up a exploding nano-bomb that deals 400%-2000% damage.
Freezing. Charge up a piercing nano-spear that deals 400%-1200% damage.

string-array.name: artificerUtility
string-array.item: Freezing. Create a barrier that hurts enemies for 100% damage.

string-array.name: artificerSpecial
string-array.item: Burn all enemies in front of you for 1700% damage.
Stunning. Burst into the sky, dealing 800% damage.

string-array.name: banditPassive
string-array.item: All attacks from behind are Critical Strikes.

string-array.name: banditPrimary
string-array.item: Fire a shotgun burst for 5x100% damage. Can hold up to 4 shells.
Fire a rifle blast for 330% damage. Can hold up to 4 bullets.

string-array.name: banditSecondary
string-array.item: Lunge and slash for 360% damage. Critical Strikes also cause hemorrhaging.
Throw a hidden blade for 240% damage. Critical Strikes also cause hemorrhaging.

string-array.name: banditUtility
string-array.item: Stunning. Deal 200% damage, become invisible, then deal 200% damage again.

string-array.name: banditSpecial
string-array.item: Slayer. Fire a revolver shot for 600% damage. Kills reset all your cooldowns.
Slayer. Fire a revolver shot for 600% damage. Kills grant stacking tokens for 10% more Desperado damage.

string-array.name: captainPassive
string-array.item: Passively gain Microbots that shoot down nearby enemy projectiles. Drones are also given Microbots.

string-array.name: captainPrimary
string-array.item: Fire a blast of pellets that deal 8x120% damage. Charging the attack narrows the spread.

string-array.name: captainSecondary
string-array.item: Shocking. Fire a fast tazzer that deals 100% damage. Travels farther if bounced.

string-array.name: captainUtility
string-array.item: Stunning. Request up to 3 Orbital Probes from the UES Safe Travels. Each probe deals 1000% damage.
Stunning. Request a kinetic strike from the UES Safe Travels. After 20 seconds, it deals 40,000% damage to ALL characters.

string-array.name: captainSpecial
string-array.item: Request a permanent Supply Beacon. Can only be requested twice per stage.
Heal all nearby allies for 10% of their maximum health every second.
Periodically Shock all neaerby enemies, immobilizing them.
Hack all nearby purchasables to a cost of $0 over time.

string-array.name: commandoPrimary
string-array.item: Rapidly shoot an enemy for 100% damage.

string-array.name: commandoSecondary
string-array.item: Fire a piercing bullet for 300% damage. Deals 40% more damage every time it passes through an enemy.
Fire two close-range blasts that deal 8x200% damage total.

string-array.name: commandoUtility
string-array.item: Slide on the ground for a short distance. You can fire while sliding.

string-array.name: commandoSpecial
string-array.item: Stunning. Fire repeatedly for 100% damage per bullet. The number of shots increases with attack speed.
Throw a grenade that explodes for 700% damage. Can hold up to 2.

string-array.name: engineerPrimary
string-array.item: Charge up to 8 grenades that deal 100% damage each.

string-array.name: engineerSecondary
string-array.item: Place a two-stage mine that deals 300% damage, or 900% damage if fully armed. Can place up to you.
Place a robot mine that deals 600% damage when an enemy walks nearby. Can place up to 4.

string-array.name: engineerUtility
string-array.item: Place an impenetrable shield that blocks all incoming damage.
Enter target painting mode to launch heat-seeking harpoons that deal 500% damage each. Can store up to 4.

string-array.name: engineerSpecial
string-array.item: Place a turret that inherits all your items. Fires a cannon for 100% damage. Can place up to 2.
Place a mobile turret that inherits all your items. Fires a laser for 200% damage per second that slows enemies. Can place up to 2.

string-array.name: hereticPrimary
string-array.item: 2s (+2s per stack) since the last shot was fired
Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

string-array.name: hereticSecondary
string-array.item: Charge up a projectile that deals 875% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.

string-array.name: hereticUtility
string-array.item: Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

string-array.name: hereticSpecial
string-array.item: Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

string-array.name: huntressPrimary
string-array.item: Agile. Quickly fire a seeking arrow for 150% damage.
Agile. Draw back a volley of 3 seeking arrows for 3x100% damage. Critical Strikes fire 6 arrows.

string-array.name: huntressSecondary
string-array.item: Throw a seeking glaive that bounces up to 6 times for 250% damage. Damage increases by 10% per bounce.

string-array.name: huntressUtility
string-array.item: Agile. Disappear and teleport a short distance. Can store up to 3 charges.

string-array.name: huntressSpecial
string-array.item: Teleport into the sky. Target an area to rain arrows, slowing all enemies and dealing 330% damage per second.
Teleport backwards into the sky. Fire up to 3 energy bolts, dealing 3x900% damage.

string-array.name: loaderPassive
string-array.item: The Loader is immune to fall damage. Striking enemies with the Loader\'s gauntlets grants a temporary barrier.

string-array.name: loaderPrimary
string-array.item: Swing at nearby enemies for 320% damage.

string-array.name: loaderSecondary
string-array.item: Fire your gauntlet forward, pulling you to target.
Stunning. Fire your gauntlet forward, dealing 320% damage. Pulls you to heavy targets. Light targets are pulled to YOU instead.

string-array.name: loaderUtility
string-array.item: Heavy. Charge up a piercing ounch for 600%-2700% damage.
Heavy. Charge up a single-target punch for 2100% damage that shocks enemies in a code for 1000% damage.

string-array.name: loaderSpecial
string-array.item: Throw a floating pylon that zaps up to 6 nearby enemies for 100% damage. Can be grappled.
Stunning. Slam your fists down, dealing 2000% damage on impact.

string-array.name: mercenaryPrimary
string-array.item: Agile. Slice in front for 130% damage. Every 3rd hit strikes in a greater area and Exposes enemies.

string-array.name: mercenarySecondary
string-array.item: Quickly slice horizontally twice, dealing 2x200% damage. If airborne, slice vertically instead.
Unleash a slicing uppercut, dealing 550% damage and sending you airborne.

string-array.name: mercenaryUtility
string-array.item: Stunning. Dash forward, dealing 300% damage. If you hit an enemy, you can dash again, up to 3 total.
Stunning. Dash forward, dealing 700% damage and Exposing enemies after 1 second.

string-array.name: mercenarySpecial
string-array.item: Target the nearest enemy, attacking them for 110% damage repeatedly. You cannot be hit for the duration.
Fire a wind of blades that attack up to 3 enemies for 8x100% damage. The last hit Exposes enemies.

string-array.name: multPrimary
string-array.item: Rapidly fire nails for 7-% damage. Finishes with a blash of 12 nails.
Fire a piercing rebar that deals 600% damage.
Fire a rocket that explodes for 360% damage. Hold up to 4.
Saw nearby enemies for 1000% damage per second.

string-array.name: multSecondary
string-array.item: Stunning. Launch a canister for 220% damage. Drops stun bomblets for 5x44% damage.

string-array.name: multUtility
string-array.item: Heavy. Zoom forward, gaining 200 armor and 220% movement speed. Deals 250% damage to enemies.

string-array.name: multSpecial
string-array.item: Passively hold TWO equipment at once. Activating \'Retool\' switches the active Equipment and MUL-T\'s primary attack.
Enter a heavy stance, equipping both your primary attacks at once. Gain 100 armor, but lose -60% movement speed.

string-array.name: railgunnerPassive
string-array.item: All Critical Strike Chance is converted into Critical Strike Damage.

string-array.name: railgunnerPrimary
string-array.item: Fire aggressive tracking rounds for 100% damage.

string-array.name: railgunnerSecondary
string-array.item: Activate your long-range scope, highlighting Weak Points and transforming your weapon into a piercing 1000% damage railgun.
Launch a heavy projectile for 1000% damage.
Perfectly time your reload to recover faster and to boost the damage of your next shot by +100%.
Activate your short-range scope, highlighting Weak Points and transforming your weapon into a quick 400% damage railgun.
Launch a light projectile for 400% damage.

string-array.name: railgunnerUtility
string-array.item: Throw out a device that pushes you and all nearby enemies away. Can hold up to 2.
Throw out a device that slows down all nearby enemies and projectiles.

string-array.name: railgunnerSpecial
string-array.item: Fire a piercing round for 4000% damage and 150% Weak Point damage. Afterwards, all your weapons are disabled for 5 seconds.
Launch a super-charged projectile for 4000% damage. Critical Strike damage is multiplied by 1.5.
Freezing. Fire a piercing round for 2000% damage.
Freezing. Launch a super-cooled projectile for 350% damage.

string-array.name: rexPassive
string-array.item: Certain attacks Weaken enemies hit, reducing their movement speed, armor, and damage.

string-array.name: rexPrimary
string-array.item: Fire 3 syringes for 3x80% damage. The last syringe Weakens and heals for 60% of damage dealt.

string-array.name: rexSecondary
string-array.item: Launch a series of seed bullets into the sky, raining down for 450% damage per second.
Use 15% HP. Launch a mortar into the sky for 450% damage.

string-array.name: rexUtility
string-array.item: Fire a Sonic Boom that Weakens all enemies hit.
Use 20% HP. Fire a Sonic Boom that damages enemies for 550% damage. Heals for every target hit.

string-array.name: rexSpecial
string-array.item: Fire a bolt that deals 330% damage and injects an enemy. On death, drop multiple healing fruits that heal for 25% HP.
Use 25% HP. Fire a flower that roots for 200% damage. Heals for every target hit.

string-array.name: voidFiendPassive
string-array.item: At full Corruption, transform your abilities into more aggressive forms.

string-array.name: voidFiendPrimary
string-array.item: Fire a slowing long-range beam for 300% damage.
Fire a short-range beam for 2000% damage.

string-array.name: voidFiendSecondary
string-array.item: Fire a plasma missile for 600% damage. Fully charge it for an explosive plasma ball instead, dealing 1100% damage.
Fire an arcing plasma bomb for 1100% damage.

string-array.name: voidFiendUtility
string-array.item: Disappear into the Void, cleansing all debuffs while moving in an upward arc.
Disappear into the Void, cleansing all debuffs while moving at a fast forward angle.

string-array.name: voidFiendSpecial
string-array.item: Crush 25% Corruption to heal yourself for 25% maximum health.
Crush 25% maximum health to gain 25% corruption.
